itunes:title: #FBF: Make Your First Hire
title: #FBF: Make Your First Hire
description:
Emily and Corey discuss why making the first hire in your business can feel overwhelming. They cover which resources you should check-in on prior to making a hire, as well as the different ways you can bring help into your business. If you want to hear more of this conversation, check out Episode 290 - What To Do Before Hiring Employees For Your Small Business >> https://beingboss.club/podcast/what-to-do-before-hiring-employees-for-your-small-business

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub
